member.name: T:Telerik.RadToastNotificationManager.PropVariant
member.summary: Represents the OLE struct PROPVARIANT.
member.remarks: Must call Clear when finished to avoid memory leaks. If you get the value of a VT_UNKNOWN prop, an implicit AddRef is called, thus your reference will be active even after the PropVariant struct is cleared.

member.summary: Called to properly clean up the memory referenced by a PropVariant instance.

member.summary: Called to clear the PropVariant's referenced and local memory.
member.remarks: You must call Clear to avoid memory leaks.
